attributes.action: Present Capt Tom Moore with a knighthood for his extraordinary fundraising
attributes.additional_details: Because at the age of 99 he has shown strength, courage and love for his country. He has raised and amazing amount of money and has shown a true sense of national spirit. He is so deserving of it.
attributes.background: Help to present Capt Thomas Moore with a knighthood for his service to our country

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
